name: ghsvs_sass_compile_and_prefix
description: Kompilieren und autoprefixen von scss in Template bs4ghsvs.

scriptsHelp.What?: Compiles, minifies, autoprefixes *.scss files to CSS and creates source-maps.
scriptsHelp.Tested?: Only with WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) + PHP 7.3 + Node + NPM on local machine.
scriptsHelp.The DIR-Array:
scss: Variable $npm_package_DIR_scss. The *.scss-directory (absolute path).
- css: Variable $npm_package_DIR_css. Directory where all the compiled, prefixed, minified CSS files are copied to after all jobs are done (absolute path).
- cssRaw: Variable $npm_package_DIR_cssRaw. Directory where all the compiled, minified, **BUT NOT PREFIXED(!)** CSS files are copied to after all jobs are done (absolute path).
- work: Variable $npm_package_DIR_work. Temporary local work directory inside same folder where package.json is located (relative path).
- raw: Variable $npm_package_DIR_raw. Temporary local directory inside work directory where not prefixed files are saved (relative path).
scriptsHelp.ghs-npm-update-check: Check for updates for packages in package.json. Prints a list, not more.
scriptsHelp.ghs-ncu-override-json: Check for updates for packages in package.json. AND override package.json file (newest stable versions). Don't forget to run npm install!
scriptsHelp.ghs-watch: Starts a nodemon watcher for changes in scss directory $npm_package_DIR_scss that starts a complete, new compilation via 'npm run ghs-all' when a scss file is changed. Also starts a complete, new compilation if the watcher is started.
scriptsHelp.ghs-all: Runs a complete job: ghs-rm ghs-mkdir ghs-compile ghs-copy-raw ghs-prefix ghs-minify ghs-produktiv
scriptsHelp.ghs-compile: Compiles *.scss files from $npm_package_DIR_scss to *.css files in **local** work dir $npm_package_DIR_work.
scriptsHelp.ghs-prefix:
Runs Autoprefixer (See file '.browserslistrc'). 
- Source: All *.css files in **local** work dir $npm_package_DIR_work. 
- Target: Replaces *.css files in **local** work dir.
scriptsHelp.ghs-produktiv: Runs several npm scripts. Makes dirs $npm_package_DIR_css and $npm_package_DIR_cssRaw in target. Copies all compiled files accordingly.

author: G@HService Berlin Neukölln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer (ghsvs.de)

scripts.ghs-all: npm-run-all ghs-rm ghs-mkdir ghs-compile ghs-copy-raw ghs-prefix ghs-minify ghs-produktiv
